name: Angel food cake with light blueberry frosting
description: snv angel food cake with dots of blueberry frosting, you almost have to search for it.
author: Thadentman

reviews.text: The tastes fantastic the FW Blueberry really comes off as a frosting, and the Pandoro, Pound Cake, Sugar Cookie make a nice cake base

This is a wonderful vape.normally i'm not too much into blueberries ,but in this recipe the cake base with that light lemon note and the frosting blend perfectly with the blueberry.it's not in your face and that's what i like about it.great job
Another Dentman banger.  Light, sweet cake with just enough blueberry to give it a little something on the side.  I really enjoyed this one.

Just mixed this up, S&V'd it. Delicious. Super light and fluffy, slight bit of lemon and you weren't kidding when you said you had to look for the blueberry. It's there but its so perfectly melded in you really have to search to notice it. 5* A+ Will mix again.

After 24 hour steep I dripped this in my hadaly, gotta say it's pretty damn yummy! Light and fluffy, I actually think the slight lemon twang compliments the blueberry wonderfully. Didn't think I'd get much blueberrry at 1% but it comes through at just the right amount. Great stuff!üëç
